name: DailyPodcastInspiration(News&Politics)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Daily Podcast Inspiration recommends recently released news&politics podcast episodes for you every day.

Using this skill will inspire you, lets you discover new podcasts and notifies you when your favourite show releases new content.

This feed contains only podcast on the topic news&politics. If you like a broader inspiration activate the non-specific skill. Also discover the other topics for yourself!

Got ideas, feedback, requests or questions? Just leave a comment or get in touch: mail@stefanwichmann.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
